title: Dr. Paul Offit, "You Bet Your Life"
description:
Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia Infectious Diseases division chief & Vaccine Education Ctr. director Dr. Paul Offit talks about the risks associated with medical innovation. He’s interviewed by Johns Hopkins University epidemiologist Dr. Emily Gu.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
